DraggerEvent

enspire.interactivity.events.IInteractivityClipEvent
enspire.interactivity.events.DraggerEvent

Event that is dispatched from any Movie Clip that inherits from Dragger when the standard mouse actions are performed on the clip.

Example usage

// assume mcDragger is of type: Dragger
var dragger:Dragger = timeline["mcDragger"];

// listen to events from this dragger
dragger.addDraggerListener(this);

// the dragger will send you events via this function
function notifyDragEvent(e:DraggerEvent) {
    switch(de.getType()) {

         case DraggerEvent.DRAGGER_OVER:

             e.getObj().gotoAndStop("over");

             break;
    }
}
Summary
DraggerEventEvent that is dispatched from any Movie Clip that inherits from Dragger when the standard mouse actions are performed on the clip.
Variables
DRAGGER_PRESSStatic enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by a mouse press.
DRAGGER_RELEASEStatic enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by a mouse release.
DRAGGER_OVERStatic enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by mousing over the Dragger.
DRAGGER_OUTStatic enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by mousing out of the Dragger.
DRAGGER_MOVEStatic enumeration returned by getType if this event was created by the mouse moving while over the Dragger.
type
obj
Functions
DraggerEventCreates a new DraggerEvent with the given type, and a reference to the Dragger instance that is linked to this event.
getTypeReturns the type of this event, which will be one of the various enumerations like DRAGGER_RELEASE.
getObj
traceMe

Functions

DraggerEvent

public function DraggerEvent(type: Number,
obj: InteractivityClip)

Creates a new DraggerEvent with the given type, and a reference to the Dragger instance that is linked to this event.

Example

var ce = new DraggerEvent(DraggerEvent.DRAGGER_PRESS,mcDragger);

getType

public function getType():Number

Returns the type of this event, which will be one of the various enumerations like DRAGGER_RELEASE.

Example

var type = de.getType();

getObj

public function getObj():InteractivityClip

traceMe

public function traceMe()
